tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE patient_anatomy_3d_models (
  model_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  model_name TEXT,
  model_data BLOB,
  date_uploaded TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
    patient_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    patient_age INT NOT NULL,
    patient_height FLOAT NOT NULL,
    patient_weight FLOAT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE 3D_Models (
    model_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    model_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    model_description TEXT,
    model_file BYTEA NOT NULL,
    patient_id INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE patient_anatomy_models (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 patient_id INT,
 model_data BLOB
)

CREATE TABLE patient_info (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 patient_id INT,
 full_name VARCHAR(100),
 dob DATE,
 gender VARCHAR(10),
 address VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE consultation_logs (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 consultation_id INT,
 provider_id INT,
 patient_id INT,
 consultation_date TIMESTAMP,
 consultation_notes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE AnatomyModels (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 patient_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
 model BLOB NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE Consultations (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 provider_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
 patient_id INT NOT NULL,
 consultation_date DATETIME
)

CREATE TABLE Providers (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 provider_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
 specialty VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE Patients (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 patient_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
 dob DATE NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE ConsultationNotes (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 consultation_id INT NOT NULL,
 note TEXT NOT NULL
)
